name: Root Rabbit
description:
This game is a product of the Global Game Jam, it contains many bugs and the experience is unpolished (also there are no settings for audio or control schemes)

A cute druid rabbit going for adventure! You can use your root-making abilities to interact and progress with the world

use the directional keys to move, c to jump and x to summon the root.

Game created during the Global Game Jam 2023 - Theme Roots - Site: Torino Global Game Jam

Credits:

Team: Traumatic Fireberg
Gabriele Ellena - Project Manager, Programmer, Game Designer
Edoardo Dorno - Game Designer, Programmer
Filippo Grosso - 2d Evnironment art
Gabriella Federighi - 2d Charater and UI Assets
Simone Zanada - Sound Designer

Player controller by Mathew J Spencer: https://github.com/Matthew-J-Spencer/Ultimate-2D-Controller

Made with Unity

Uses FMOD integrations
